meanings.definition: The state or quality of being podgy.
meanings.sent1: Her podginesses made her look cute and cuddly.
meanings.sent2: The baby's podginesses were adorable and chubby.
meanings.sent3: The podginesses of the teddy bear made it the perfect snuggle buddy.
meanings.sent4: His cheeks had a podginesses that reminded her of ripe peaches.
meanings.sent5: The podginesses of the puppy's belly was irresistible to pet.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a rounded, chubby appearance.
meanings.sent1: The podginesses of the snowman's belly was endearing.
meanings.sent2: She loved the podginesses of the baby's cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The podginesses of the cartoon character made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The podginesses of the pumpkin gave it a friendly look.
meanings.sent5: The podginesses of the hamster's cheeks were so squishy.
